cs.IT, cs.SI, cs.NI, cs.CC, cs.LG. 

The paper discusses the decoding of polar codes, which is a topic related to information theory (cs.IT). The use of factor graphs and belief propagation also suggests the sub-category of signal processing (cs.SI). The paper also mentions the use of parallel decoding for high throughput applications, which falls under the sub-category of networking and internet architecture (cs.NI). The paper proposes a new method for constructing permutations, which involves optimization and algorithm design, falling under the sub-category of computational complexity (cs.CC). Finally, the paper evaluates the performance of the proposed decoder, which involves statistical analysis and machine learning, falling under the sub-category of machine learning (cs.LG).
